transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan join ke liye na link call.
Customer: Join mere ko link nahi aaya sir.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Mere ko link nahi aaya.
Executive: Sir main aapko email id aapko batata hu jaake na email id pe aaya kya.
Customer: Haan ji madam. Haan email id mere pass nahi hai sir abhi wo kya storage full ho gaya.
Executive: Main aapko whatsapp karu.
Customer: Whatsapp kar do.
Executive: To main ek baar hi bhejiye whatsapp number pe link bhejta hu main aapko is tarah hai.
Customer: Haan share kijiye.
Executive: Mere ko ek baar hi bhejiye whatsapp pe aapko link share karta hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapko na hi hi bhejiye main number save karna padega na aapko link share hoga.
Customer: Haan, theek hai.
Executive: Sir ek baar mere naam save kijiye matlab number save kijiye mere naam se fir aapko main link share karta hu.
Executive: Phone mat katiye on call hi rakh lijiye.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Phone mat katiye on call hi mere number save karke mere ko hi bhejiye fir whatsapp pe fir aapko link share karta hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Dijiye ek baar.
Customer: Sir is number pe whatsapp hai kya?
Executive: Haan haan main aapko number bolta hu main.
Executive: 9389.
Customer: Ek minute, ek minute.
Customer: 93.
Executive: 89.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 21.
Customer: 21.
Executive: 6398.
Customer: 63 98.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ek baar repeat kijiye madam.
Executive: Sir repeat kijiye ek baar.
Executive: Shivam Verma karke aa raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan aapko save kar lijiye naam se ek baar.
Executive: Mere ko hi share kijiye.
Customer: Abhi bhejo sir hi bhej deta hu main.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Main aapko link share karta hu main ek minute dijiye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Madam number save kiya aapne tabhi to aapko link share hoga number save kiya aapne.
Customer: Number save kiya tha sir.
Executive: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Haan bas ek minute dijiye aapko link share karta hu.
Executive: Unko sunao.
Executive: Madam aapko link share kar diya dekhiye check kijiye.
Executive: [Foreign language]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive the join link.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the link via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- link, whatsapp, email
